title: PLEASE
body: Riot Can We Please Just Put U.R.F And All The Other Games In Custom Gamemode

replies.body: I agree, but it should be for Diamond+ and not Bronze trash, like you OP. You don't deserve to play these game modes.
don't worry about him, he just mad cause he got smited.
It's April in a couple days. NURF mode is in bound. Quit your whining.
maybe Riot {secretly} made temporary to get entertainment from whinging
true this^ but he just wants them to be in the custom modes not in PVP mode... there is a small difference, but yeah hush and stop asking, they get the point.
